nodes.body:
...a los objetos de tipo elemento...?

Elemento sounds generic and like it might be confused with XML elements.
nodes.diffHunk:

nodes.body:
Feedback incorporated (399008)
This will take few days to get back and will come as a new PR with othe cumulative translations.
You could:
a. Approve and complete this PR. The next PR (Friday) will have a subset of the new updates/
b. Close this and the new PR will have the new subset plus this.
